English translation: agree with someone (indirect object) [stative: to be in agreement (rather than to reach agreement)]

Complement projection/reversion through: Without preposition på: neither. With preposition på: typically projective
Certainty: Without på: incompatible. With på: typically
Counter-certainty: Without på: incompatible. With på: incompatible
Uncertainty: Without på: always. With på: compatible

belief/ignorance wrt int: always belief-implying* (see note about "if any" examples)

P-to-Q distributivity: tvivla 1: N/A. tvivla 2: always P-to-Q distributive
